QuestData.Title: Egg Wave
QuestData.Description: Without any defenders, the Firelands eggs are vulnerable.$B$BTake wing once more and smash those eggs! Simply rush over them to crush them. Search all the nooks, crannies, and side-caves. Hurry!
QuestData.LogDescription: Equip a Twilight Firelance and fly Aviana's Guardian. Smash 40 Firelands Eggs by running over them. Press the flap button to flap your mount's wings!
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you cracked a few eggs?$B$BI don't even want to know what the Twilight's Hammer was breeding down here...
